credit_line: Gift of The Jack Denst Designs, Inc.
dimensions: Overall: 274.3 x 74.3 cm (9 ft. x 29 1/4 in.)
title: Pocket Change
description: Motif of U.S. coins, printed over a running band of blocks.  All denominations of coins are shown.  The pennies are printed in a metallic copper ink, while the other coins allow the Mylar foil ground to show through.  The border is printed 2 across.
name: Border
